section.text: Escape Sequences allow you to use special symbols you normally can't in C or modify the cursors position.
The table below will show you some of the different Escape Sequences in C:

row.cell: Puts the cursor on a new line
Moves the cursor 1 tab's width forward
Allows the \ character to be printed out
Allows a " to be printed out and not be mistaken as a start/end of a string literal by the compiler
Allows a ' to be printed out and not be mistaken as a start/end of a character literal by the compiler
